line_1: Their mothers hang their head, in doleful plight I weet.
line_2: The patient cow doth, to eschew the heat,

line_1: Their mothers hang their head, in doleful plight I weet.
line_2: And while the lambs in fainter voices bleat,

line_1: Her Lips no living Bard, I weet,
line_2: May say, how Red, how Round, how Sweet:
Alas! it's no thy neebor sweet,

line_1: Me all too mean for such a Task I weet:
line_2: I'll follow Horace with impetuous Heat,
